name: TuberculosisTestsForMycobacteriumSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Tuberculosis (Tests for Mycobacterium species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mycobacterium species in culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Mycobacterium sp isolate / culture; Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex isolate / culture;  

LOINC search: "Mycobacterium (avium or bovis or sp or abscessus or avium complex or kansaii or leprae) (culture or isolate) -panel -interpretation"),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
